TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS AMERICAN <TXA> BANKS TO BE MERGED
TEXT.BODY: Texas American Bancshares Inc said three of its Texas American banks will be merged into Texas American Bank/Galleria. The corporation said the Spring Branch, Fonderen and Gulfway Texas American banks will become separate banking offices of TAB/Galleria. Reuter
